episodes.title: EDICT ZERO – FIS EPISODE 101
episodes.summary: EDICT ZERO – FIS EPISODE 101 (SCI-FI) MATURE AUDIENCES New Earth, like Old Earth, is a planet of mostly water, but with even less land. It is a small world of five islands, each island a state in The Federation: the democratic entity otherwise known as 'Edict Two' which governs the bulk of humanity. In response to the cataclysmic events on New Year's Day of the year 2415, the FIS assembled a task force at their headquarters in Capitol City to find the responsible party, eliminate the danger posed to the public, and deliver justice for the victims. In acknowledgement of the severity of the threat a special unit of the task force has been authorized to pursue unusual leads and the alternate outside-the-box theories those leads may support. "Edict Zero - FIS" focuses on this small team of special agents and their investigations, which will put them at odds with the highest authority of humankind: Edict One. Whose secrets are getting harder to keep. Slipgate Nine Entertainment

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 12 – JUSTICE AND THE HAPPY ENDING
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 12 – JUSTICE AND THE HAPPY ENDING (MYSTERY) Every man has his ghosts. Old square-jaw didn't figure he had any right to expect to be the exception. But sometimes the past takes on flesh and looks you in the eye... and things can never be quite the same afterwards. When that moment comes for Jack and Trixie, will it bring down the whole house of cards, coffee and gaudy metaphors; or will it re-introduce those most contradictory concepts - Justice and the Happy Ending?Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 11 – JUSTICE IN LOVE AND WAR
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 11 – JUSTICE IN LOVE AND WAR (MYSTERY) They say all's fair in love and war, and Jack and Trixie are about to put that to the test. When Jack finds a drowned rat of a piano player who's both struck by love and several dozen gangsters, love and war don't seem like such different concepts anymore. It's a mad charge into the lion's den, all in the name of romance. Even the hard-boiled have their soft spots. Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 10 – HAMMER OF JUSTICE
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 10 – HAMMER OF JUSTICE (MYSTERY) Jack may not know much about art, but he knows what he likes... and what he doesn't. He doesn't much like Nick Franklin's looks, or his self-satisfied grin or his manicured fingernails. What he does like is a client that can afford a fat insurance policy and a couple of gumshoes to go with it. But can Jack and Trixie fit in with the arty set enough to protect Franklin's latest "discovery"? Where will they stand when the Hammer of Justice falls? Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 09 – NO JUSTICE
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 09 – NO JUSTICE (MYSTERY) It was the end of an uncharacteristic flurry of activity at the mighty world headquarters of Jack Justice Investigations. Trixie was crossing the final i's and dotting the final t's when she looked up and realized that Jack was nowhere to be found. And he'd taken their old snitch Freddie the Finger Hawthorne with him into the ether. Sometimes a gal's just got to look a gift horse in the mouth, and if she ever wants to see old square-jaw sashay in the front door again, this is one of those times. But can she and her "new partner" keep away from each other's throats long enough to find the old one, or is this the beginning of life with... No Justice? Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: HICKORY, DICKORY, DOOM
episodes.summary: HICKORY, DICKORY, DOOM (OLD TIME RADIO) A grandfather clock is the central piece in this gruesome and morbid tale. A young couple from Pennsylvania pick up a grandfather clock at an estate sale to give to the local minister. What they do not know is that the malfunctioning time piece does more than tell time, it is actually a gateway to the demon world.  CBS Radio Mystery Theater (Analogue Recording)

episodes.title: IDIOT BOX
episodes.summary: IDIOT BOX (SUSPENSE) LANGUAGE In a dark, dystopian near future, reality TV takes a dark turn to boost the ratings, as it becomes apparent that no matter what the public votes, something terrible is going to happen. Yet, all is not quite what it seems. 19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 08 – JUSTICE AND THE DELUGE
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 08 – JUSTICE AND THE DELUGE (MYSTERY) It was the third straight day of rain that did it. People had been cooped up for days, riding out the storm, and Black Jack is sure that a flurry of human misery, or as he likes to call it - rent money is on its way. But when he turns out to be more right than either he or Trixie could have guessed, they find themselves on an island in the middle of the city, with the water rising fast. An island of the "gaudy, hard-boiled metaphor" variety, admittedly; but sometimes that's the way it goes. Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: DRESSED TO KILL
episodes.summary: DRESSED TO KILL (OLD TIME RADIO) An unemployed actor plans a bizarre drama of enacting his own death and consequently impersonating his wife to claim the insurance money. CBS Radio Mystery Theater (Analogue Recording)

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 07 – JUSTICE BE DONE
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 07 – JUSTICE BE DONE (MYSTERY) Mordecai Brasseau had been nothing but bad luck for Jack Justice Investigations since the first time he walked through the door. A nice man, but a jinx - quite possibly the unluckiest man in the world. Each time Jack and Trixie took on a case for him, they swore it would be the last. Sooner or later they had to be right... and the registered letter inviting them to the reading of Mordecai's will suggested that time had finally come.... Or, maybe not. Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 06 – JUSTICE’S HOLIDAY
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 06 – JUSTICE’S HOLIDAY (MYSTERY) It wasn't much of a holiday by most people's standards... just a turn around the park in the sunshine... but boy oh boy, how the work piles up at Jack Justice Investigations. Piles up right in the middle of the floor in a still-fresh pool of blood. Now all Jack and Trixie have to do with the rest of the day is figure out who the triggerman was and why the corpse had a thousand dollars in an envelope with their names on it. And if they can manage it, solving the case before the law puts them away for it wouldn't be a bad idea either. Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 05 – JUSTICE INCORPORATED
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 05 – JUSTICE INCORPORATED (MYSTERY) If it sounds too good to be true, it's all in a day's work at Jack Justice Investigations. When one of the city's most high-powered lawyers wants to buy the agency, Lock Stock and Barrel, Jack and Trixie have just twenty-four hours to figure out what the catch is and torpedo the best offer they've ever had! Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 04 – JUSTICE DELAYED
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 04 – JUSTICE DELAYED (MYSTERY) When Jack and Trixie are hired to solve a seven year old murder, they figure it's a fool's errand. But if this case is so cold, why all the heat from upstairs to lay off? Will they finally run into that brick wall that has their names on it... or will they deliver Justice Delayed?  Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 03 – JUSTICE IS BLIND
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 03 – JUSTICE IS BLIND (MYSTERY) Sometimes the answer's right in front of your eyes. Sometimes you're so busy with what you think you saw, you can't be bothered to stop and look again. When Jack and Trixie pay the bills with a little "Peeping Tom" routine, they don't expect the commandments being broken to include the biggest "Thou Shalt Not" of 'em all. But then again, sometimes Justice Is Blind. Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 02 – JUSTICE FOR SOME
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 02 – JUSTICE FOR SOME (MYSTERY) When Jack and Trixie are hired to protect a society dame's diamonds at a charity ball, it looks like they've finally caught that elusive nice, simple case. But when the guest list includes not one, not two but three notorious thieves, things get complicated in a heckuva hurry. Times like that a guy's lucky to manage Justice For Some!  Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 01 – JUSTICE SERVED COLD
episodes.summary: BLACK JACK JUSTICE 01 – JUSTICE SERVED COLD (MYSTERY) Decoder Ring Theatre is proud to present the first episode of hardboiled pulp detective action with Black Jack Justice! This week, Jack and his partner Trixie Dixon, girl detective learn lost love letters and a mysterious client add up to more than meets the eye. It's up to them to dish out Justice Served Cold.  Decoder Ring Theatre

episodes.title: DUPLICITY
episodes.summary: DUPLICITY (SCI-FI) An actor takes a chance to help out a friend aboard an unfashionable residence hotel on a space station.  Adapted from a story by O. Henry. 19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: MYTHOLOGIA, EPISODE 03 OF 3: THE AESIR
episodes.summary: MYTHOLOGIA, EPISODE 03 OF 3: THE AESIR AND THE BUILDING OF THE WALL (COMEDY/DRAMA) In this Norse myth, Odin and his family create a home for themselves in Asgard. But to keep themselves safe, they'll need to build a wall, a wall that can only be built by magic, and whose construction comes at a great price. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: MYTHOLOGIA, EPISODE 02: ANNIE CHRISTMAS
episodes.summary: MYTHOLOGIA, EPISODE 02: ANNIE CHRISTMAS (COMEDY/DRAMA) Keel boat pilot Annie Christmas rescues her crew from the devious Ekrom Edgerton and helps her cousin Caleb stand up to bully Jabez Mulligan in this American tall tale. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: MYTHOLOGIA, EPISODE 01: CUPID AND PSYCHE
episodes.summary: MYTHOLOGIA, EPISODE 01: CUPID AND PSYCHE (COMEDY/DRAMA)You'd think a romance with the God of Love would be easy, but Psyche discovers otherwise in this ancient tale of jealous goddesses, talking ants, and timeless love. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: GALAXY MASTER VERSUS THE VARN
episodes.summary: GALAXY MASTER VERSUS THE VARN (HORROR) Ed Gwynn is tired of playing the greatest villain "Galaxy Master" in the movies. Unfortunately for him, so are the Varn! . From the Wavefront Anthology Series.  Starring Cayenne Chris Conroy, John Bell and M. Sieirio Garcia. Electric Vicuna Productions

episodes.title: THE PHILADELPHIA XPERIMENT
episodes.summary: THE PHILADELPHIA XPERIMENT (SCI-FI-HORROR) EXPLICIT LANGUAGEAND MATURE THEMES Confined to a mental ward in 1951 and awaiting his impending lobotomy, an enigmatic WW2 veteran known only as Patient X recalls an ill-fated experiment to render a U.S. warship invisible resulting in nightmarish side effects for the survivors as well as uncovering a mind-bending temporal terror. Campfire Radio Theater

episodes.title: ALONE IN THE NIGHT
episodes.summary:
ALONE IN THE NIGHT (SCI-FI) Left alone on a Listening Post, Andrew tries to survive as the last living soul in an empty universe. From the Wavefront Anthology Series. Starring Jack Ward, Genevieve Jones, Tanja Milojevic, David Ault, and John Bell.  Electric Vicuna Productions

 

2013 SILVER MARK TIME AWARD WINNER FOR SCIENCE FICTION!

episodes.title: THE SHUNNED HOUSE
episodes.summary: THE SHUNNED HOUSE (HORROR) Five gentlemen meet at a dinner partyto tell tales of mystery and imagination. Sitting down to dinner with friends was never quite so …chilling! Charles takes the lead again, recounting the adventures of an unfortunate uncle. Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft. Adapted by Julie Hoverson.  19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE THING ON THE DOORSTEP
episodes.summary: THE THING ON THE DOORSTEP (HORROR) What does a man do when his new bride really, really wants his body? Adapted from a story by H. P. Lovecraft. 19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE WICKED ONES
episodes.summary: THE WICKED ONES (SUSPENSE) Inspired by the Ray Bradbury classic novel, 'The Wicked Ones' tells the story of two brothers in 1982 sucked into the world of a mysterious traveling carnival.  Featuring the musical theme 'The Carnival Master,' created and performed by Psych-goth. Icebox Radio Theater

episodes.title: WELCOME TO WILLIAMSVILLE
episodes.summary: WELCOME TO WILLIAMSVILLE (COMEDY) Welcome to Williamsville, where tradition and routine dictate the ebb and flow of life. Yet, Williamsville is not without its stories… How do one repressed arsonist, a sexually-charged geriatric, a slimy drug dealer and a soccer mom on steroids combine in the most exciting thing to happen in Williamsville since 1936? Starring a cast of talented and twisted University of Southern Maine students. Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: THE PICTURE IN THE HOUSE
episodes.summary: THE PICTURE IN THE HOUSE (HORROR) Five gentlemen meet at a dinner partyto tell tales of mystery and imagination. Sitting down to dinner with friends was never quite so …chilling! Charles recounts an encounter with a creepy old man in the middle of nowhere. Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft. Written by Julie Hoverson.  19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: MARKHEIM
episodes.summary: MARKHEIM (DRAMA) In this Robert Louis Stevenson tale, a suspicious, erratic man visits an antique shop on Christmas Day. There, his desperate actions will bring him face to face with a mysterious visitor who seems to know his every thought, and who will ask him to make an eternally binding choice. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: THE VIEW FROM WITHIN
episodes.summary: THE VIEW FROM WITHIN (HORROR) Five gentlemen meet at a dinner partyto tell tales of mystery and imagination.Sitting Down to dinner with friends was never quite so …chilling!Richard's approach to a little mystery of his own is changed a bit by the presence of an Auguste guest. Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft. Written by Julie Hoverson.  19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE FACTS CONCERNING…
episodes.summary: THE FACTS CONCERNING (HORROR) Five gentlemen meet at a dinner partyto tell tales of mystery and imagination. Sitting down to dinner with friends was never quite so …chilling! Warren turns his story into a bit of a game, as he tells about a noble house that... degenerated.  Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft. Written by Julie Hoverson.  19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE HAUNTER OF THE DARK
episodes.summary: THE HAUNTER OF THE DARK (HORROR) Five gentlemen meet at a dinner partyto tell tales of mystery and imagination. Sitting down to dinner with friends was never quite so …chilling! Edward reads from a diary of a fellow painter/writer who descended into madness and oblivion. Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft. Written by Julie Hoverson.  19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: ARGONAUTICA PART 2 OF 2
episodes.summary: ARGONAUTICA PART 2 OF 2 (DRAMA) This live performance follows Jason and his heroic band of Argonauts on their quest to claim the golden fleece. Along the way, they will encounter powerful gods, fearsome warriors, nightmarish creatures, and other thrilling challenges. Part two of two. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: ARGONAUTICA PART 1 OF 2
episodes.summary: ARGONAUTICA PART 1 OF 2 (DRAMA) This live performance follows Jason and his heroic band of Argonauts on their quest to claim the golden fleece. Along the way, they will encounter powerful gods, fearsome warriors, nightmarish creatures, and other thrilling challenges. Part one of two. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: DEAD LONDON
episodes.summary: DEAD LONDON (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) War Of The Worlds 75th Anniversary Contest Winner – FIRST PLACE. The Wireless Theatre Company.Ten entries were received from four countries, all under 15 minutes and celebrating the story of War of the Worlds (both the classic radio drama as well as the HG Wells novel). Contest requirements were: arrival inside a meteorite, tripods are used for locomotion, massive destruction, natural biological solution.

episodes.title: HERBERT WEST VERSUS THE MARTIANS
episodes.summary: HERBERT WEST VERSUS THE MARTIANS HALLOWEEN/HORROR) War Of The Worlds 75th Anniversary Contest Winner – SECOND PLACE Ten entries were received from four countries, all under 15 minutes and celebrating the story of War of the Worlds (both the classic radio drama as well as the HG Wells novel). Contest requirements were: arrival inside a meteorite, tripods are used for locomotion, massive destruction, natural biological solution.

episodes.title: THE REFERTILIZATION OF THE WEED PLANET 313
episodes.summary: THE REFERTILIZATION OF THE WEED PLANET 313 (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) War Of The Worlds 75th Anniversary Contest Winner – THIRD PLACE. Ten entries were received from four countries, all under 15 minutes and celebrating the story of War of the Worlds (both the classic radio drama as well as the HG Wells novel). Contest requirements were: arrival inside a meteorite, tripods are used for locomotion, massive destruction, natural biological solution.

episodes.title: THE SENDING
episodes.summary: THE SENDING (OLD TIME RADIO) Innocent co-eds at a college get their souls sold to the demon by their professor. Black magic is afoot as the professor barters their souls to extend his wife's life.  CBS Radio Mystery Theater (Analogue Recording)

episodes.title: 9 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – NICHOLAS - A CHRISTMAS TALE
episodes.summary: 9 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – NICHOLAS - A CHRISTMAS TALE (SPECIAL FEATURE) MATURE THEMES Imagine if the world as you know it, was nothing more than an illusion. What if creatures like elves, dragons, vampire, zombies and werewolves walk amongst you every day. But you never see them. This is the world I walk in. I am called Byron and these are my chronicles.   It is Christmas eve and Byron is still missing. Lord Slate has been summoned to account for his brothers absence only to discover the Tale of Nicolas. Darker Projects

episodes.title: 8 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – A TIME OF THE FALLEN
episodes.summary: 8 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – A TIME OF THE FALLEN (SPECIAL FEATURE) MATURE THEMES Imagine if the world as you know it, was nothing more than an illusion. What if creatures like elves, dragons, vampire, zombies and werewolves walk amongst you every day. But you never see them. This is the world I walk in. I am called Byron. And these are my chronicles. It is the rise of the age of darkness. Byron's life will be forever changed by the choice he must make. But will it be the right one?  Darker Projects

episodes.title: A WHITE CHRISTMAS SPECIAL
episodes.summary: A WHITE CHRISTMAS SPECIAL (CHRISTMAS) To anyone young or old who is nostalgic for Christmas’s past. Here’s a Christmas show the whole family can gather around and enjoy.  Featuring Bing Crosby singing his most famous song ‘White Christmas’.  Originally aired on December 20, 1953. SEASONS GREETINGS EVERYONE!  Old Time Radio

episodes.title: DREAMING OF A DEAD CHRISTMAS
episodes.summary: DREAMING OF A DEAD CHRISTMAS (HORROR) LANGUAGE Two college coeds returning home for the holidays unwittingly unleash a zombie outbreak at a truck-stop after running over a mysterious man on a desolate country road. Campfire Radio Theater

episodes.title: 7 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – A TIME OF RISING
episodes.summary: 7 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – A TIME OF RISING (SPECIAL FEATURE) MATURE THEMES Imagine if the world as you know it, was nothing more than an illusion. What if creatures like elves, dragons, vampire, zombies and werewolves walk amongst you every day. But you never see them. This is the world I walk in. I am called Byron. And these are my chronicles. It is the time of rising. An age of darkness has descended upon the world and Byron is taken captive.  Darker Projects

episodes.title: THE TIME MACHINE PART 2 of 2
episodes.summary: THE TIME MACHINE PART 2 of 2 (SCI-FI) The Time Machine was written by H. G. Wells and adapted for audio by Thomas E. Fuller. The Time Machine is one of the most well-known examples of classic science fiction. Performed Live. Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: THE TIME MACHINE PART 1
episodes.summary: THE TIME MACHINE PART 1 (SCI-FI) The Time Machine was written by H. G. Wells and adapted for audio by Thomas E. Fuller. The Time Machine is one of the most well-known examples of classic science fiction. Performed Live. Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: TIME AND AGAIN
episodes.summary: TIME AND AGAIN (OLD TIME RADIO) A clockmaker comes across a mysterious clock that can give him an additional hour every day. All it needs is a little blood in return. CBS Radio Mystery Theater (Analogue Recording)

episodes.title: 6 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – A TIME OF RETURNING
episodes.summary: 6 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – A TIME OF RETURNING (SPECIAL FEATURE) MATURE THEMES Imagine if the world as you know it, was nothing more than an illusion. What if creatures like elves, dragons, vampire, zombies and werewolves walk amongst you every day. But you never see them. This is the world I walk in. I am called Byron. And these are my chronicles. It is the time of returning. An age of darkness that decends upon the world that will change all mankind has known. And even Byron is unable to stop it.  Darker Projects

episodes.title: 5 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – CODE OF CONDUCT PT 2
episodes.summary: 5 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – CODE OF CONDUCT PT 2 (SPECIAL FEATURE) MATURE THEMES Imagine if the world as you know it, was nothing more than an illusion. What if creatures like elves, dragons, vampire, zombies and werewolves walk amongst you every day. But you never see them. This is the world I walk in. I am called Byron. And these are my chronicles. Under the light of the full moon the Werewolves of The Blood Moon clan hunt their own. What sacrifice will be required to protect an innocent and can Byron's sanctuary protect Chris Sparrow from the hunt?  Darker Projects

episodes.title: SNOW GLOBE – ACT 2
episodes.summary: SNOW GLOBE – ACT 2 OF 2 (DRAMA) A Christmas fable for grownups. An estranged daughter returns home on Christmas Eve after discovering what she believes to be a message from beyond. Act two of two. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.summary: 2 THE BYRON CHRONICLES – THE DISORIENTED (SPECIAL FEATURE) MATURE THEMES Imagine if the world as you know it, was nothing more than an illusion. What if creatures like elves, dragons, vampire, zombies and werewolves walk amongst you every day. But you never see them. This is the world I walk in. I am called Byron. And these are my chronicles. After an incident with a wraith-like creature, Christina Sparrow's life is changed and she sees the world as it really is. Byron, meanwhile, searches to the source of a deadly new drug that has hit the streets of Portland.  Darker Projects

episodes.title: 1 THE BYRON CHRONICLES - THE TAINT

episodes.summary: PHILIP MARLOWE – THE GRIM ECHO (OLD TIME RADIO) Starring Gerald Mohr. The Adventures of Philip Marlowe is one of the classic all time Private Eye Radio Drama Series.   Analogue Recording

episodes.title: ROBOTS, VAMPIRES AND SATELLITES
episodes.summary: ROBOTS, VAMPIRES AND SATELLITES (COMEDY) This live performance, a collaboration with the Memphis Comic and Fantasy Convention and the Memphis College of Art, tells the story of a robot vampire and the unexpected friendship that helps him discover his true function. Featuring renowned voice actor Tom Kenny.  Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: PHILIP MARLOWE – THE OPEN WINDOW
episodes.summary: PHILIP MARLOWE – THE OPEN WINDOW (OLD TIME RADIO) Starring Gerald Mohr. The Adventures of Philip Marlowe is one of the classic all time Private Eye Radio Drama Series.   Analogue Recording

episodes.title: THE WAR OF THE WORLDS
episodes.summary: THE WAR OF THE WORLDS (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) MATURE THEMES LANGUAGE A young woman's cell phone diary chronicles the end of days first hand as deadly alien war machines emerge from fallen meteorites and rain fiery destruction upon an unsuspecting populace. A new adaptation of the H. G. Wells classic! Campfire Radio Theater

episodes.title: CLAYBOURNE – EPISODE 12 OF 12
episodes.summary: CLAYBOURNE – EPISODE 12 OF 12 (SPECIAL FEATURE) Claybourne was commissioned for New Zealand radio station Newstalk ZB in the late 1990s. It played four afternoons a week, just after 3pm - and was repeated at 1am. In both slots, it caused an audience spike in the ratings. Nevertheless it was cancelled after six months, despite having been designed with a full one year story arc. As a result, although there is some resolution, there are still quite a few loose ends left untied, and a hell of a good cliffhanger. Pronoun Productions

episodes.title: PHILIP MARLOWE – THE WHITE CARNATION
episodes.summary: PHILIP MARLOWE – THE WHITE CARNATION (OLD TIME RADIO) Starring Gerald Mohr. The Adventures of Philip Marlowe is one of the classic all time Private Eye Radio Drama Series.   Analogue Recording

episodes.title: TWO IF BY SEA
episodes.summary:
TWO IF BY SEA (COMEDY) From writer, director Julie Hoverson a screwball comedy about a woman on board a ship in the early part of the last century, and she's not who she claims to be, but then, who does?

19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: CLAYBOURNE – EPISODE 11 OF 12
episodes.summary: CLAYBOURNE – EPISODE 11 OF 12 (SPECIAL FEATURE) Thompson is an American holidaying in New Zealand after his breakup nearly led to a breakdown. He receives a message from his employer..., multinational communication giant Koestler Industries, that there’s a 'problem' at their satellite station up in the far north of the country, and since he’s over there anyway, he should check it out.The problem is, ‘problem’ doesn’t even begin to describe it.   Pronoun Productions

episodes.title: THE HALLOWEEN SHOW
episodes.summary: THE HALLOWEEN SHOW (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) Chatterbox's fifth annual Halloween broadcast on 91.1 WKNO features five spine-tingling tales of terror. "The Confessional," in which a repentant murderer is trapped by a demonic force; "The Damned Thing," an adaptation of Ambrose Bierce's classic story about an invisible monster; "Burning Cold," in which a vacationing family is lost in a mysterious realm; "Food for Worms," which finds a hapless reporter stumbling into the clutches of a wicked crone and her pet and "A Voice from the Woods," two campers are put to the test after a shocking intrusion onto their campsite. Chatterbox Audio Theater

Paranoia and dread soon take hold as she begins to suspect her kindly boss may be engaging in a terrifyingly macabre practice.  Adapted from the NIGHTFALL classic! Campfire Radio Theater

episodes.summary: THE ADVENTURES OF NAIROBI JACK RACKHAM (MYSTERY) The Lost Gold Of The Atlantimengani Parts 1 and 2 Nairobi Jack Rackham was a down on his luck adventurer living in darkest deepest Africa until one day he had a chance meeting with a University Professor and his scientist daughter. What unfolds is a journey to uncover the secrets of a gold mask, the mystical Black Nile and perhaps even the lost city of Atlantis! Performed before a live audience.   Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: PHILIP MARLOWE – THE HEAT WAVE
episodes.summary: PHILIP MARLOWE – THE HEAT WAVE (OLD TIME RADIO) Starring Gerald Mohr. The Adventures of Philip Marlowe is one of the classic all time Private Eye Radio Drama Series. On a sweltering day in April, Philip recieves a telegram to check out a burlesque show and report on the girl in the gold mask. Marlowe does his best to describe the sultry dancer known as Heat Wave, and in the name of doing business, he goes back stage to meet her. What he uncovers is a tangle of identities and a body of dead woman. Analogue Recording

episodes.title: PHILLIP MARLOWE – THE EASY MARK
episodes.summary: PHILLIP MARLOWE – THE EASY MARK (OLD TIME RADIO) Starring Gerald Mohr. The Adventures of Philip Marlowe is one of the classic all time Private Eye Radio Drama Series. This case involves a former marriage, alimony and murder. Facts are taking shape and Philip is determined to put these puzzle pieces together. What skeletons will he find as he digs up the dirt? Philip faces down the danger, and explains it all in the end. Analogue Recording

episodes.title: CLAYBOURNE – EPISODE 1 OF 12
episodes.summary: CLAYBOURNE – EPISODE 1 OF 12 (SPECIAL FEATURE) Thompson is an American holidaying in New Zealand after his breakup nearly led to a breakdown. He receives a message from his employer..., multinational communication giant Koestler Industries, that there’s a 'problem' at their satellite station up in the far north of the country, and since he’s over there anyway, he should check it out.The problem is, ‘problem’ doesn’t even begin to describe it. Part Thriller, part Sci-Fi, part Soap Opera, part Comedy, Claybourne was the most sonically ambitious radio drama production ever to hit New Zealand's airwaves. It gained something of a cult following, won a radio award for best dramatic production, and later became the most popular spoken word program on MP3.com.  Pronoun Production

episodes.title: FALL OF THE HERO
episodes.summary: FALL OF THE HERO (FANTASY) Sir Grace was the most valiant of all knights, decked in glorious armor that glowed in the sun and a record of dragon-slaying and maiden saving on par with none. But a battle with a renowned wizard with ambiguous ambitions forces Sir Grace to consider things he never imagined, and face his greatest enemy yet, himself.  Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: THE HOUSE ON MULBERRY HILL
episodes.summary: THE HOUSE ON MULBERRY HILL (HORROR) Creeps meets creepy in The House on Mulberry Hill! But don’t let that scare you! Here’s a little horror piece for sitting around the summertime campfire.  19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE MINISTER OF CHANCE - PART 5 OF 5
episodes.summary: THE MINISTER OF CHANCE - PART 5 OF 5 (SCI-FI FANTASY) MATURE THEMES LANGUAGE Acclaimed Science Fiction Fantasy Adventure featuring some of Britain’s finest actors. The Minister, like The Doctoris a Timelord, first introduced to audiences in the award-winning and record-breaking BBC Doctor Who mini-series Death Comes to Time. Radio Static

episodes.title: WHO’S ON FIRST
episodes.summary: WHO’S ON FIRST (OLD TIME RADIO) Now that the hot lazy days of summer are here, our thoughts turn to Baseball and the great outdoors. And speaking of Baseball, here’s one of the greatest comedy routines of all time from the comedic team of Abbott and Costello. A summertime treat from years gone by brought to you by Moonlight Audio Theatre.

episodes.title: ONE BY ONE
episodes.summary: ONE BY ONE (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) Stars John Bellas Dan Cummings the ‘Old-Timey Man’ just ready for retirement from thirty years as a DJ and local celebrity. This Halloween however, an accidental crash in the Halifax harbor sends the city and Dan into a spiral of terror! Written and directed by Jack J. Ward. From the Darker Musings Anthology series of Mystery and Terror.  Electric Vicuna Productions

episodes.title: THE WILL OF THE WOODS – EPISODE 5 of 5
episodes.summary: THE WILL OF THE WOODS – EPISODE 5 of 5 (FANTASY) A fairy tale for all ages, brought to life by a talented cast of voice actors, a wide range of intriguing sound effects and a wonderful music score. Enter the magical world of the Infinite Woods, where a young Elven girl seeks out the help of a grim-looking Wraith and sets out on a quest to find her lost friend. The story is suitable for everyone and anyone who simply loves beautiful stories and fairy tales. With the voices of Domien Groot, Stephanie Cuyt and Eline Hoskens.  Audio Epics

The Adventures of Philip Marlowe is one of the classic all time Private Eye Radio Drama Series.  Analogue Recording

A tragedy at the local mine leads to the discovery of a presence deep below the earth, a presence that threatens to bring the town's dark secrets to light. Part three of three.  Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: HUNGRY HOLLOW
episodes.summary: HUNGRY HOLLOW (HORROR) On a weekend camping trip, three boyhood friends rescue an enchanting young hiker lost in the mountains but soon find themselves pawns in a dark ritual as old as the hills with lethal consequences. And as shadows grow longer, a hideous truth emerges regarding the campfire legends of a wrathful old woman said to inhabit the valley.  Campfire Radio Theater

episodes.title: THE CHICKEN SALAD OF A TROUBLED MIND
episodes.summary: THE CHICKEN SALAD OF A TROUBLED MIND (DRAMA) The winning script of The Wireless Theatre Company’s first Young Writer's Competition, The Chicken Salad of a Troubled Mind is Set in the deep and murky subconscious of a troubled mind. We follow the footsteps of Sarah as she attempts to lunch with her mum, and bond with her sister, without her inner most thoughts brimming over the edge.  20 year old  Helen Monks is a writer from Birmingham, who's poetic style of writing caught the judges attention.  The Wireless Theatre Company

episodes.title: BARTLEBY THE SCRIVENER – PART 2 OF 2
episodes.summary: BARTLEBY THE SCRIVENER – PART 2 (DRAMA) Melville's classic tale of an inscrutable copyist who nearly brings down the whole system, by doing nothing at all. "Bartleby the Scrivener" was written by Herman Melville in 1853, a time of self-discovery for the author and the growing city of New York in which his story takes place. "Bartleby" was originally published anonymously in two parts in Putnam’s Monthly Magazine under the title "Bartleby the Scrivener: A Story of Wall Street.  Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: BARTLEBY THE SCRIVENER – PART 1 OF 2
episodes.summary: BARTLEBY THE SCRIVENER – PART 1 (DRAMA) Melville's classic tale of an inscrutable copyist who nearly brings down the whole system, by doing nothing at all. "Bartleby the Scrivener" was written by Herman Melville in 1853, a time of self-discovery for the author and the growing city of New York in which his story takes place. "Bartleby" was originally published anonymously in two parts in Putnam’s Monthly Magazine under the title "Bartleby the Scrivener: A Story of Wall Street.  Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: FEATHERTOP
episodes.summary: FEATHERTOP (DRAMA) In this "moralized fable" by Nathaniel Hawthorne, a witch is so proud of the scarecrow she builds that she decides to bring it to life. Disguising her creation as a gentleman, she sends him out into the world to make mischief. Will he be able to pass unnoticed among the other "empty-headed" people in the town?  Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: NIGHT TERROR: ROADSIDE CASTLE
episodes.summary: NIGHT TERROR: ROADSIDE CASTLE (SUSPENSE) Two American Tourists driving between Aberdeen and Glasgow. The middle of the night. A Rainy Scottish night And the Scottish Moores. Why does this all sound so Familiar?  Darker Projects

episodes.title: THE HITCHHIKER
episodes.summary: THE HITCHHIKER (SUSPENSE) Ice Box Radio Theatrer’s version of the Lucille Fletcher classic, 'The Hitchhiker' originally starring Orson Welle's on Suspense and the Mercury Theater On Air. Ice Box Radio Theater

episodes.title: HURRICANE
episodes.summary: HURRICANE (OLD TIME RADIO) A couple take refuge from a storm in a secluded beach house, only to find themselves in the company of two strangers.  Performed by the CBS Mystery Theatre - 1974. (Analogue Recording)

episodes.title: 1918 EPISODE 4 – TO THE LAST MAN, WOMAN OR CYBORG
episodes.summary: 1918 EPISODE 4 – TO THE LAST MAN, WOMAN OR CYBORG (SCI-FI) The thrilling conclusion of season 1 of 1918 – in which all major characters are killed off and all loose ends neatly tied up! 1918 won Honorable Mention at the Mark Time Awards. Aural Stage Studios Productions

episodes.title: 1918 EPISODE 3 – THE SOMEWHAT SECRET BATTLE
episodes.summary: 1918 EPISODE 3 – THE SOMEWHAT SECRET BATTLE (SCI-FI) Evelyn and Henry discover the secret entrance to a secret German base that is brimming with, er, secrets!  1918 won Honorable Mention at the Mark Time Awards. Aural Stage Studios Productions

episodes.title: 1918 EPISODE 2 – THE WHOLE ALBERT BALL OF WAX
episodes.summary: 1918 EPISODE 2 – THE WHOLE ALBERT BALL OF WAX (SCI-FI) The Red Baron steals the orbs, sending Henry and Evelyn on a dangerous mission into the heart of Germany. 1918 won Honorable Mention at the Mark Time Awards. Aural Stage Studios Productions

episodes.title: 1918 EPISODE 1 – THE STEADFAST TIN SOLDIER
episodes.summary: 1918 EPISODE 1 – THE STEADFAST TIN SOLDIER (SCI-FI) In the pilot episode, Dr. Xanders and Dr. Isotope attempt to recruit vaudevillian actress Evelyn Ceriwyn to The Order of The Horizon, for only she holds the key to… THE ORBS. 1918 won Honorable Mention at the Mark Time Awards. Aural Stage Studios Productions

episodes.title: THE MAN IN THE CHAIR
episodes.summary: THE MAN IN THE CHAIR (SUSPENSE) What do you do when the government you thought you knew turns out not to be everything you thought it was?  Night Terrors – Darker Projects

episodes.title: THE SHADOW OF A KILLER
episodes.summary: THE SHADOW OF A KILLER (OLD TIME RADIO) The lines between reality and fantasy blur when an actor portraying a police detective on a television drama agrees to help a woman, investigate into the case of her missing husband. Performed by the CBS Mystery Theatre - 1981. (Analogue Recording)

episodes.title: THE RATS IN THE WALLS
episodes.summary: THE RATS IN THE WALLS (HORROR) An American returns to the family's ancestral home in England, only to discover that heredity can be terrifying.  Adapted by Julie Hoverson from the story by H.P. Lovecraft.  19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: AN ATLANTA CHRISTMAS SPECIAL
episodes.summary: AN ATLANTA CHRISTMAS SPECIAL (CHRISTMAS) Three Christmas stories and a lovely song. We hope you enjoy it! The Santa Claus Blues, by Thomas E. Fuller; Rory Rammer, Space Marshal: A Visit From St. Rex, by Ron N. Butler and The Tree Comes to Atlanta, by Thomas E.Fuller. O Holy Night, performed by the ARTC Chorus. Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: BORROWED TIME
episodes.summary: BORROWED TIME (SCI-FI) After an accident with a time travelling machine, Louis Blunt finds himself in more trouble than he could imagine in a thousand lifetimes! Starring Joe Stofko, John Bell, Lyn Cullen, and Colleen MacIssac. Electric Vicuna Productions

episodes.title: SORRY WRONG NUMBER
episodes.summary: SORRY WRONG NUMBER (SUSPENSE) Sonic Summerstock Playhouse 2012 presents the classic “Sorry, Wrong Number” starring Schoel Strang and the Electric Vicuna Players. Directed by Jack J. Ward and produced by John Bell. Electric Vicuna Productions

episodes.title: COACH NUMBER 6
episodes.summary: COACH NUMBER 6 (SUSPENSE) Frank has one time a year with his daughter and son to make up being the father he's not. They take an annual trip across Canada on the rail. You never know who you're going to meet on the lonely tracks, even terror and death. Starring David Ault and John Bell.  Electric Vicuna Productions

episodes.title: TWILIGHT ROAD
episodes.summary: TWILIGHT ROAD (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) A young woman, pronounced dead hours earlier, springs to life on the embalming table. Haunted by disembodied voices and recollections of a shadowy afterlife, Cerina is desperate to escape the ghoulish confines of the city morgue. Might she suffer delusions due to her accident or is something far more grisly amiss?Campfire Radio Theater

episodes.title: THE BYRON CHRONICLES HALLOWEEN SPECIAL
episodes.summary: THE BYRON CHRONICLES HALLOWEEN SPECIAL (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) October 1968. Bodies of the recently dead are returning to life and feeding upon the living. Byron must find a way to stop the night of living death before its the end of everything. Darker Projects

episodes.title: FROM BEYOND
episodes.summary: FROM BEYOND (HORROR) Adapted for audio by Julie Hoverson from a story by H.P. Lovecraft. What kind of place is it? Why it’s the scene of a tragic event, can’t you tell?  19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE FALCON BANNER PART 10
episodes.summary: THE FALCON BANNER PART 10 (SCI-FI) By the twenty second century, mankind had stretched forth its hand to command the stars. Other races were discovered and as the human sphere of influence expanded they were happy to live in peaceful coexistence. Now three hundred years after the fall of the Terran Empire humans find themselves the subject race. It is into this oppressive world, that the most unlikely of men are thrust into the roles of heroes. Darker Projects

episodes.title: FOUR TALES OF TERROR
episodes.summary: FOUR TALES OF TERROR (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) Just in time for Halloween.Chatterbox's fourth annual Halloween performance on 91.1 WKNO FM. This spine-chilling show features four original tales of horror that were performed live on the air, Free Me, Leila, Food for Worms and Happy Harry.  Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: DIALED IN – EPISODE 7 – STRAW INTO GOLD
episodes.summary: DIALED IN – EPISODE 7 – STRAW INTO GOLD (SUSPENSE) A princess (Linda Mason) contacts a ghostwriter (Matthew J Boudreau) known for his unusual success to write her story. However, the cost of success may be a little too high for her liking. Featuring Javert Boudreau on Trombone. Directed by Eline Hoskens. Sound Design by Mike de Almeida. Music and editing by Matthew J Boudreau.  Aural Stage Studios

episodes.title: SPACEGIRL -  DOWNLOADING THE LEGACY
episodes.summary: SPACEGIRL -  DOWNLOADING THE LEGACY (COMEDY) Join Melinda Peterson as SpaceGirl, with David Ossman and Phil Proctor of the Firesign Theatre and Gordon Smuder of Transylvania TV in this sendup of superhero comics on radio. “The clever team of Stearns and Price are back again with another space adventure! Very nice indeed.  A tight script, good acting and surprisingly good sound especially for a live performance. As you’ll hear, there are certainly a lot of laughs in this one. It’s a very polished piece of work. – Tom Lopez, ZBS    Great Northern Audio Theatre

episodes.title: DIALED IN – EPISODE 6 - CUSTOMER RELATIONS
episodes.summary: DIALED IN – EPISODE 6 - CUSTOMER RELATIONS (SUSPENSE) After he is involuntarily implanted with a tracking device, Caleb Cross (Pete Boisvert) must jump through corporate hoops in order to reach an old friend, Stephen (Brian Morvant) to get it removed. Features Gyda Arber, Christianne Greiert, John Bell, Cayenne Chris Conroy, Nat Angstrom and Jennifer Harder. Featuring music by Jonathan Coulton. Directed by Samantha Mason. Sound Design by Mike de Almeida. Music and editing by Matthew J Boudreau.   Aural Stage Studios

episodes.title: DIALED IN – EPISODE 5 -  CONFESSIONS OF A CHAT ROOM ROMEO
episodes.summary: DIALED IN – EPISODE 5 -  CONFESSIONS OF A CHAT ROOM ROMEO (SUSPENSE) MATURE THEMES After receiving advice from Dear Abby, Nemo (Joe Stofko) seeks help from Anita (Gyda Arber) in order to overcome his internet addiction. Directed by Samantha Mason. Sound Design by Mike de Almeida. Music and editing by Matthew J Boudreau.  Aural Stage Studios

episodes.title: DIALED IN – EPISODE 4 – JESUS GETS REJECTED
episodes.summary: DIALED IN – EPISODE 4 – JESUS GETS REJECTED (SUSPENSE) MATURE THEMES Vanessa (Christianne Greiert) is tempted by Satan (Mike Racioppa) and won’t accept Jesus (Cayenne Chris Conroy) into her heart. Directed by Samantha Mason. Music by Amy K Bormet. Sound Design by Mike de Almeida. Theme music and editing by Matthew J Boudreau. Features: Purple Blues by Amy K Bormet. Aural Stage Studios

episodes.title: DIALED IN – EPISODE 3 – WISH YOU WERE HERE
episodes.summary: DIALED IN – EPISODE 3 – WISH YOU WERE HERE (SUSPENSE) Desperate to contact his Grandmother (Jenelle Sosa), Brent (PG Lorusso) takes some extraordinary measures to stay in touch. Features Linda Mason, Jennifer Harder and Amye Lewis. Directed by Samantha Mason. Music by Lucien Desar. Sound Design by Mike de Almeida. Theme music and editing by Matthew J Boudreau. Aural Stage Studios

episodes.title: DIALED IN – EPISODE 2 – SHOOTING THE BULL
episodes.summary: DIALED IN – EPISODE 2 – SHOOTING THE BULL (SUSPENSE) With the help of a 911 operator (Heather Lee Rogers), Amy (Jennifer O’Donnell) must find her way out of a China shop occupied by a bull (John Bell). Features PG Lorusso. Directed by Samantha Mason. Sound Design by Mike de Almeida. Music and editing by Matthew J Boudreau.  Aural Stage Studios

episodes.title: DIALED IN – EPISODE 1 - ANCIENT EVIL
episodes.summary: DIALED IN – EPISODE 1 - ANCIENT EVIL  (SUSPENSE) When an ancient Xipe curse is released in the Archaeology lab, Ryan (Mike Racioppa) & Dr. Miller (David Ault) must contain it to prevent an apocalyptic outbreak on campus. Features Nat Angstom and Amye Lewis. Directed by Samantha Mason. Music by Peter Van Riet. Sound Design by Mike de Almeida. Theme music and editing by Matthew J Boudreau. Aural Stage Studios

episodes.title: THE LONG WEEKEND
episodes.summary: THE LONG WEEKEND (DRAMA) MATURE THEMES A young married couple from the city, in the midst of relationship troubles, decides to spend a long weekend in the country. In the strangeness of their surroundings, with the heat and the mosquitoes, they lie awake. Gradually, their conversation turns from playful to angry. As the resentment escalates, they are at first unaware that something is in the woods, creeping closer to their cabin. Something unforeseen. Something terrifying. Midnight Radio Theater

episodes.title: INSOMNIA
episodes.summary: INSOMNIA (SUSPENSE) MATURE THEMES Sydney cannot sleep. On the clock, the minutes seem to go by in slow motion. His mind refuses to shut down. He imagines the doctor’s expression when he gets the test results that show, what? He thinks about the possibility of the worst. In emotional turmoil, he rewinds his life back to her and the terrible mistake that has haunted him ever since.  Midnight Radio Theater

episodes.title: OPEN SEASON
episodes.summary: OPEN SEASON (MYSTERY) An old lady tormented by lewd phone calls blasts a man with a shotgun as he walks in through the door, and Brattleboro’s everyman detective, Joe Gunther, is called out to investigate. It’s clear that not everything is as it seems, the description of the phone calls and the dead man outside don’t match up. And even stranger, the dead man and the old lady were jurors on the same controversial trial three years ago.  Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: DAY OF THE DEAD
episodes.summary: DAY OF THE DEAD (DRAMA) A tale inspired by the myth of Orpheus. A young man heads to New Orleans in search of his missing lover, and finds something he never expected, himself. Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: THE FALCON BANNER PART 9
episodes.summary: THE FALCON BANNER PART 9 (SCI-FI) By the twenty second century, mankind had stretched forth its hand to command the stars. Other races were discovered and as the human sphere of influence expanded they were happy to live in peaceful coexistence. Now three hundred years after the fall of the Terran Empire humans find themselves the subject race. It is into this oppressive world, that the most unlikely of men are thrust into the roles of heroes. Darker Projects

episodes.title: THE GAME IS AFOOT THE ADVENTURES OF THE TICK TOCK DICK
episodes.summary: THE GAME IS AFOOT THE ADVENTURES OF THE TICK TOCK DICK (COMEDY) A hilarious take off of the Sherlock Holmes, Dr. Watson characters. Performed live.  Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: THE DEMON PART 2
episodes.summary: THE DEMON PART 2 (HORROR) Originally broadcast as part of the 2011 Trans-Continental Terror radio program. THE DEMON is a chilling tale of four souls trapped in a church basement while some 'thing' prowls outside God's house during a supernatural storm. Jim Yount, Vicki Olson, and Rachel & Jeff Adams star. The Icebox Radio Theater

episodes.title: THE DEMON PART 1
episodes.summary: THE DEMON PART 1 (HORROR) Originally broadcast as part of the 2011 Trans-Continental Terror radio program. episodes.title: DEAD AND GONE
episodes.summary: DEAD AND GONE (DRAMA) A Southern retelling of James Joyce's classic story THE DEAD. In early-20th-century Memphis, an insecure schoolteacher struggles to navigate the social currents at his aunts' holiday party. But before the night is over, several unexpected encounters and one stunning revelation will change the way he views his family, his friends, and himself. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: THE HAUNTED CELL
episodes.summary: THE HAUNTED CELL (THRILLER) An audio adaptation by Campfire Radio Theater of the classic Lights Out Tale of the Haunted Cell as presented on the Sonic Society radio program. Sonic Summerstock Theatre

episodes.summary: THE MINISTER OF CHANCE - PART 3 (SCI-FI FANTASY) MATURE THEMES LANGUAGE Acclaimed Science Fiction Fantasy Adventure featuring some of Britain’s finest actors. The Minister, like The Doctor is a Timelord, first introduced to audiences in the award-winning and record-breaking BBC Doctor Who mini-series Death Comes to Time. Radio Static

episodes.title: DRACULA
episodes.summary: DRACULA (HORROR) An adaptation of the Mercury Theatre On Air’s production of the Bram Stoker novel Dracula.  Produced and Directed by, Alex Gilmour and Gwendolyn Jensen-Woodard.  Gypsy Audio

episodes.title: FROM AN AMBER BLOCK
episodes.summary: FROM AN AMBER BLOCK (HORROR) A new acquisition by the Museum contains a dark secret. Science unleashed it, but what can stop it? Adapted from a story by Tom Curry as published in Astounding Stories in 1930.  19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE MOST DANGEROUS GAME
episodes.summary: THE MOST DANGEROUS GAME (SUSPENSE) Adapted anew from the short story, a retelling of the story heard in the 1940s on Escape and Suspense! Wealthy big-game hunter Sanger Rainsford falls off his boat in the middle of the Caribbean and finds himself on a curious island. He finds the mansion of General Zaroff, a Cossack who has a taste for the hunt, and will go to any extreme to keep himself entertained. Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: THE MINISTER OF CHANCE - PART 2 OF 5
episodes.summary: THE MINISTER OF CHANCE - PART 2 (SCI-FI FANTASY) MATURE THEMES LANGUAGE Acclaimed Science Fiction Fantasy Adventure featuring some of Britain’s finest actors. episodes.title: THE MINISTER OF CHANCE - PART 1 OF 5
episodes.summary: THE MINISTER OF CHANCE - PART 1 (SCI-FI FANTASY) MATURE THEMES LANGUAGE Acclaimed Science Fiction Fantasy Adventure featuring some of Britain’s finest actors. episodes.title: THE DEAD GIRL PART 3
episodes.summary: THE DEAD GIRL PART 3 (DRAMA) Mature Themes and Language. The Man Who Carries The Water. Father Hugh Brooks, a faithless, alcoholic priest, stumbles into the town of Bloody Springs, Louisiana and becomes entangled in the aftermath of a tragic and mysterious drowning. Part three of three. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: THE DEAD GIRL PART 2
episodes.summary: THE DEAD GIRL PART 2 (DRAMA) Mature Themes and Language. The Eyes of God. Father Hugh Brooks, a faithless, alcoholic priest, stumbles into the town of Bloody Springs, Louisiana and becomes entangled in the aftermath of a tragic and mysterious drowning. Part two of three. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: THE DEAD GIRL PART 1
episodes.summary: THE DEAD GIRL PART 1 (DRAMA) Mature Themes and Language. Welcome to Bloody Springs. Father Hugh Brooks, a faithless, alcoholic priest, stumbles into the town of Bloody Springs, Louisiana and becomes entangled in the aftermath of a tragic and mysterious drowning. Part one of three. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: THE DUNWICH HORROR - PART 4 OF 4
episodes.summary: THE DUNWICH HORROR - PART 4 OF 4 (HORROR) A trio of professors uncover something dreadful in a backwater town. From the story by H.P. Lovecraft, adapted by Julie Hoverson. 19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE DUNWICH HORROR - PART 3 OF 4
episodes.summary: THE DUNWICH HORROR - PART 3 (HORROR) A trio of professors uncover something dreadful in a backwater town. From the story by H.P. Lovecraft, adapted by Julie Hoverson. 19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE DUNWICH HORROR - PART 1 OF 4
episodes.summary: THE DUNWICH HORROR - PART 1 (HORROR) A trio of professors uncover something dreadful in a backwater town. From the story by H.P. Lovecraft, adapted by Julie Hoverson. 19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE MAIDEN WITHOUT HANDS
episodes.summary: THE MAIDEN WITHOUT HANDS (DRAMA) Recorded LIVE at The Roundhouse in Camden in collaboration with Roundhouse Radio, a dark adaptation of the Brother's Grimm tale. The Wireless Theatre Company

episodes.title: THE BRAVE LITTLE TAILOR
episodes.summary: THE BRAVE LITTLE TAILOR (DRAMA) Recorded LIVE at The Roundhouse in Camden in collaboration with Roundhouse Radio, a dark adaptation of the Brother's Grimm tale. The Wireless Theatre Company

episodes.title: MERIDIAN 7-1212
episodes.summary: MERIDIAN 7 1212 (DRAMA) Various lives intertwine through the telephone time service in late-1930s New York. A modern recreation of an Old Time Radio broadcast originally aired in 1939.  Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: THE MASTER’S HUNGRY CHILDREN
episodes.summary: THE MASTER’S HUNGRY CHILDREN (HORROR) As World War 2 draws to a close, a squad of bullying Nazis occupy a remote Romanian village populated by old men, women and livestock. But all is not as it appears as a bitter Winter night falls and the German's find themselves stalked by something far more bloodthirsty than the pursuing Red Army. Campfire Radio Theater

episodes.title: THE GAME IS AFOOT THE PHANTOM CHIPPENDALE
episodes.summary: THE GAME IS AFOOT THE PHANTOM CHIPPENDALE (COMEDY) A hilarious take off of the Sherlock Holmes, Dr. Watson characters. Performed live.  Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: THE PIPER AND MUSICIANS OF BREMEN
episodes.summary: THE PIPER AND MUSICIANS OF BREMEN (DRAMA) Recorded LIVE at The Roundhouse in Camden in collaboration with Roundhouse Radio, a dark adaptation by Stuart Price of the Brother's Grimm tale. The Wireless Theatre Company

episodes.title: HANSEL AND GRETEL
episodes.summary: HANSEL AND GRETEL (HORROR) Recorded LIVE at The Roundhouse in Camden in collaboration with Roundhouse Radio, Hansel & Gretel is a dark adaptation of the Brother's Grimm tale.The Wireless Theatre Company

episodes.title: NIGHT TERRORS – BLACKLIST
episodes.summary: NIGHT TERRORS BLACKLIST (HORROR) Computers are all the rage, everything is online. Books, music, movies and even secret government documents. There are those who view the Internet as their playground. Artie Fisher does, but he soon discovers what it means to play in the big kids' playground. Darker Projects

episodes.title: MASTER ZACHARIUS - PART 2 OF 2
episodes.summary: MASTER ZACHARIUS  - PART 2 OF 2 (SUPERNATURAL) As his creations inexplicably malfunction, an aging clockmaker feels his heart winding down toward death. How far will he go to restore his clock's vitality and ensure his own eternal life? Adapted from a story by Jules Verne. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: MASTER ZACHARIUS - PART 1 OF 2
episodes.summary: MASTER ZACHARIUS  - PART 1 (SUPERNATURAL) As his creations inexplicably malfunction, an aging clockmaker feels his heart winding down toward death. How far will he go to restore his clock's vitality and ensure his own eternal life? Adapted from a story by Jules Verne. Chatterbox Audio Theater

episodes.title: 4 MURDER UNDER A MALATHION MOON 04
episodes.summary: 4 MURDER UNDER A MALATHION MOON 04 (MYSTERY) EPISODE 4 Join LA’s finest Private Eyes Sini Rigotini and Midge Newton as they take on another zany caper in the City of Angles. Written and Directed by Erin Connelly and Jackie Lobland. Bargain Basement Productions

episodes.title: THE LEARNING CURVE
episodes.summary: THE LEARNING CURVE (SCI-FI/COMEDY) In the future to help the economy help itself, everything from wookies to tribbles are emancipated and given the title "consumer." But, is Hollywood ready for creature produced features? Great Northern Audio Theatre

episodes.title: THE SHADOW – THE LITTLE MAN WHO WASN’T THERE
episodes.summary: THE SHADOW – THE LITTLE MAN WHO WASN’T THERE (MYSTERY) The classic radio and pulp hero takes on his toughest case when a criminal learns the secret of invisibility. A recreation of an Old Time Radio show originally aired in 1945. Chatterbox Audio Theatre

episodes.title: 3 MURDER UNDER A MALATHION MOON 03
episodes.summary: 3 MURDER UNDER A MALATHION MOON 03 (MYSTERY) EPISODE 3 Join LA’s finest Private Eyes Sini Rigotini and Midge Newton as they take on another zany caper in the City of Angles. Written and Directed by Erin Connelly and Jackie Lobland. Bargain Basement Productions

episodes.title: 2 MURDER UNDER A MALATHION MOON 02
episodes.summary: 2 MURDER UNDER A MALATHION MOON 02 (MYSTERY) EPISODE 2 Join LA’s finest Private Eyes Sini Rigotini and Midge Newton as they take on another zany caper in the City of Angles. Written and Directed by Erin Connelly and Jackie Lobland. Bargain Basement Productions

episodes.title: 1 MURDER UNDER A MALATHION MOON 01
episodes.summary: 1 MURDER UNDER A MALATHION MOON 01 (MYSTERY) EPISODE 1 Join LA’s finest Private Eyes Sini Rigotini and Midge Newton as they take on another zany caper in the City of Angles. Written and Directed by Erin Connelly and Jackie Lobland. Bargain Basement Productions

episodes.title: THE TROLL OF STONY BROOK
episodes.summary: THE TROLL OF STONY BROOK (FANTASY) What would happen if a troll still lived in the diminishing wild? An awkward teenager soon finds out when he accidentally hits something along a dark road that will change his life forever. Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: THE CLOUD
episodes.summary: THE CLOUD (SCI-FI MYSTERY) On the edge of the galaxy the crew of the starship Centurion discover that the stars are going out. With the entire Universe at risk they race to discover the secret behind the Cloud. Brokensea Audio Productions

episodes.title: SINISTER PROPERTIES
episodes.summary: SINISTER PROPERTIES (SUPERNATURAL) Artemus Drake is a real estate agent, but don’t call him if you’re in the market for a home. He’s in the business of procuring properties that the sellers are all too eager to be rid of! JAWDrop Productions

episodes.title: WILLIAM’S LEAP FOR FREEDOM
episodes.summary: WILLIAM’S LEAP FOR FREEDOM (DRAMA) This moving drama is based on freed American Black slave William Wells Brown and his struggle for freedom. Performed live at the NATF festival in West Plains Missouri for Black history month. SueMedia Productions

episodes.title: THE JEWELS OF THE 11TH GENERATION
episodes.summary: THE JEWELS OF THE 11TH GENERATION (SCI-FI COMEDY) In the distant future two zany space pirates looking for the ultimate treasure end up with more than they bargained for in this hilarious romp. Great Northern Audio Theatre

episodes.title: INTENSIVE CARE
episodes.summary: INTENSIVE CARE (HORROR)  When Alex wakes up in a run-down New England hospital with foggy memories of a car accident, he soon realizes that his condition is more critical than he first believed.  Finalrune Productions and Aural Stage Studios

episodes.title: SHADOW OF THE SHAPESHIFTERS
episodes.summary: SHADOW OF THE SHAPESHIFTERS (SCI-FI) Rhianna, an unwilling Shapeshifter, is thrown into the dark world of nameless identities and gruesome death at the hands of the Leedol. A world where everything is not as it seems. RZM Creative

episodes.title: A TRILOGY FOR XMAS
episodes.summary: A TRILOGY FOR XMAS (CHRISTMAS) Nothing is ever normal at 19 Nocturne Boulevard. So when Olivia ,decides to read a few of her favorite Xmas tales, things get a bit out of hand. Adapted from tales by Arnold Bennett, Rudyard Kipling, and Joseph Conrad.

episodes.title: THE WITCH HUNTER CHRONICLES 9 OF 9
episodes.summary: THE WITCH HUNTER CHRONICLES (FANTASY) EPISODE 9 of 9 Ogle award winning dark fantasy tale about a fictional renaissance world were doom is fast approaching and the end of all things may be nigh.  Audio Epics

episodes.title: THREE CHRISTMAS STORIES
episodes.summary: THREE CHRISTMAS STORIES – (CHRISTMAS) Three uplifting Christmas Stories especially for the Holiday Season. Christmas Rose, Christmas On The High Seas and Rudolphium. Performed Live.  Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.summary: THE WITCH HUNTER CHRONICLES  (FANTASY) EPISODE 1of 9  Ogle award winning dark fantasy tale about a fictional renaissance world were doom is fast approaching and the end of all things may be nigh.  Audio Epics

episodes.title: BLUE HANUKCHRISTMAS CAROL
episodes.summary: BLUE HANUKCHRISTMAS CAROL (CHRISTMAS) A funny take on the classic Christmas story, A Christmas Carol. It’s Christmas Eve and the spirits of Hanukah make an appearance in the wrong apartment. Performed Live.  Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: GHOST OF A CHANCE
episodes.summary: GHOST OF A CHANCE (SUPERNATURAL) A girl living in a haunted house must find a way to protect her way of life. 19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: INTO THE LABYRINTH 1
episodes.summary: INTO THE LABYRINTH 1 (SPECIAL) Farm Report Of The Worlds. Imagine waking up to AM radio the day after the famous War Of The Worlds broadcast. Penny Dreadful. What happens when a lost book mysteriously appears on a library shelf? Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: DARK PASSENGER
episodes.summary: DARK PASSENGER (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) Two teenage friends start scaring each other on the drive to a dismal haunted house on the coast of Maine. But when their innocent fun starts to become all too real, they soon realize what true terror is. Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: NIGHT CHILLS
episodes.summary: NIGHT CHILLS (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) Justin and Jill were content in their new home until the unexplained noises, the icy rooms and a terrifying dead of the night visitor. Campfire Radio Theater

episodes.title: FIVE TALES OF TERROR
episodes.summary: FIVE TALES OF TERROR (HALLOWEEN/HORROR) Just in time for Halloween, five tales of Terror, performed live. Happy haunting everyone! The Ghost Behind The Black Door, Leaving You Is Hell, Bone Lake, Third Shift, H1Nsane. Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: GHOST DANCE
episodes.summary: GHOST DANCE (DRAMA) Attracting new tourists to a Wild West show wasn’t easy. Until the owners introduced a long forgotten Indian dance. But will it collide with modern day sensibility?  Performed Live. Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: WAITING FOR A WINDOW
episodes.summary:
WAITING FOR A WINDOW (COMEDY DRAMA) An unexpected storm throws Norman off his course to somewhere. The island he lands on is nice enough with a bar that’s always open. But no one seems to leave. Is Norman trapped in paradise?  Finalrune Productions

 

GOLD OGLE AWARD WINNER 2009

episodes.title: TO DINE WITH THE DEVIL
episodes.summary: TO DINE WITH THE DEVIL (HORROR) During the deep cold winter of 1810 a Russian soldier befriends a young woman who offers him a warm meal. Is this a dream? And exactly what is being served? Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: SORRY WRONG NUMBER
episodes.summary: SORRY WRONG NUMBER (SUSPENSE) A bedridden woman accidentally dials a number and is connected to a call between two men who are plotting a murder. She becomes increasingly frantic as time begins to run out for the victim. Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: NOTHING AT ALL
episodes.summary: NOTHING AT ALL (FANTASY) A Girl called Nothing At All befriends a magical forest being in this heart warming fantasy tale.  Performed Live.  Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: THE FALL OF THE HOUSE OF USHER
episodes.summary: THE FALL OF THE HOUSE OF USHER (OLD TIME RADIO/HORROR) Adapted from a short story by Edgar Allan Poe and performed by the CBS Mystery Theatre 1974. (Analogue Recording)

episodes.title: BLUES FOR JOHNNY RAVEN
episodes.summary: BLUES FOR JOHNNY RAVEN (MYSTERY) LANGUAGE The Ambience Man. Follow hard drinking offbeat Private Investigator Johnny Raven as he takes on the case of the girl with the voice. Performed Live. Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS - 8 OF 8
episodes.summary: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS -  (SPECIAL FEATURE) EPISODE EIGHT OF EIGHT Join Jack Flanders as he searches for the elusive and mystical Fourth Tower of Inverness and the strange characters he encounters on his quest. ZBS Media

episodes.title: THREE SKELETON KEYS
episodes.summary: THREE SKELETON KEYS (HORROR) Three men stationed at an isolated lighthouse soon discover the horror awaiting them when a mysterious ship adrift in the ocean makes landfall. Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: AN HOUR TO KILL
episodes.summary: AN HOUR TO KILL (DRAMA) A small town with a strange secret, ripe for the pickings by three petty criminals. Sounds like the perfect crime. Or is it? 19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS - 7
episodes.summary: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS  – (SPECIAL FEATURE) EPISODE SEVEN OF EIGHT Join Jack Flanders as he searches for the elusive and mystical Fourth Tower of Inverness and the strange characters he encounters on his quest. ZBS Media

episodes.title: THE CLEANSED
episodes.summary:
THE CLEANSED - PROLOGUE  (SCI-FI) MATURE THEMES In the not so distant future, the world as we know it starts to unravel. And then things really start to go bad! A post-apocalyptic audio adventure of our times. Finalrune Productions

episodes.title: DEMON EYES
episodes.summary: DEMON EYES (HORROR) Rookie FBI agent Sara Gowan must locate the missing victims of serial killer Wesley Morrow before his execution. Will Morrow’s mysterious eyeglasses provide insight into the frightful truth? Campfire Radio Theater

episodes.title: MY THREE GRANDMOTHERS
episodes.summary:
MY THREE GRANDMOTHERS (COMEDY) Think having two grandmothers is a hoot? Young Jessie has three! Their mad dash to the mall for doughnuts ends up with the family car submerged in the lake. Twice! RZM Creative

episodes.title: SEANY BOY
episodes.summary: SEANY BOY – (DRAMA) Starring Liam Heffernan. A story about a grieving, elderly Cork farmer who retreats into a fantasy world of Cowboys, with violent consequences. From the Audio Gothic series produced by Crazy Dog Audio Theatre

episodes.title: THE BIG DARK
episodes.summary: THE BIG DARK  (DRAMA) In the near future an unknown disease ravishes the human population turning everyone it infects into vampires. Will the Cops prevail in protecting the population from the predators?  19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: THE COLOUR OUT OF SPACE
episodes.summary: THE COLOUR OUT OF SPACE – (HORROR) ) H. P. Lovecraft's The Colour Out of Space, adapted by Ron N. Butler and performed live. Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: CAT WHACKERS
episodes.summary: CAT WHACKERS – (DARK COMEDY) LANGUAGE A story of two twenty-something idiots who go into business whacking cats for cold hard cash, with predictably disastrous results. No cats were harmed in the making of this production. Washington Audio Theatre

episodes.title: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS - 5
episodes.summary: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS  – (SPECIAL FEATURE) EPISODE FIVE OF EIGHT Join Jack Flanders as he searches for the elusive and mystical Fourth Tower of Inverness and the strange characters he encounters on his quest. ZBS Media

episodes.title: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS - 4
episodes.summary: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS  – (SPECIAL FEATURE) EPISODE FOUR OF EIGHT Join Jack Flanders as he searches for the elusive and mystical Fourth Tower of Inverness and the strange characters he encounters on his quest. ZBS Media

episodes.summary: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS  – (SPECIAL FEATURE) EPISODE THREE OF EIGHT Join Jack Flanders as he searches for the elusive and mystical Fourth Tower of Inverness and the strange characters he encounters on his quest. ZBS Media

episodes.summary: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS  – (SPECIAL FEATURE) EPISODE TWO OF EIGHT Join Jack Flanders as he searches for the elusive and mystical Fourth Tower of Inverness and the strange characters he encounters on his quest. ZBS Media

episodes.summary: THE FOURTH TOWER OF INVERNESS  – (SPECIAL FEATURE) EPISODE ONE OF EIGHT Join Jack Flanders as he searches for the elusive and mystical Fourth Tower of Inverness and the strange characters he encounters on his quest. ZBS Media

episodes.title: ANY OLD RAGS
episodes.summary: ANY OLD RAGS – (DRAMA) You better run...the rags man is on his way!  Precarious Audio Theatre

episodes.title: THE GARGOYLE’S SHADOW
episodes.summary: THE GARGOYLE’S SHADOW (HORROR) Paddy the stone sentinel witnesses a robbery and an assault at his church. Will the powers that be release him to seek justice on the perpetrators?  Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: THE PIGEON DROP
episodes.summary: THE PIGEON DROP - (MYSTERY/CRIME) A little crime story about the oldest con. A Full Cast Reading with music and sound effects. Written by Michael A. Black. Voices In The Wind Audio Theatre

episodes.title: THE SHADOW OVER INNSMOUTH
episodes.summary: THE SHADOW OVER INNSMOUTH (HORROR) H. P. Lovecraft's The Shadow Over Innsmouth, adapted for audio by Thomas E. Fuller and Gregory Nicholl.  Featuring Harlan Ellison and anime voice actor Michael Brady. Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: KISSED BY A STRANGER
episodes.summary: KISSED BY A STRANGER (FAMILY) Will a chance encounter with an English gentleman on a train bound for London be Cordelia’s true love?  A coming of age story set against the backdrop of Victorian England. Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: TUMBLEWEED ROUNDUP
episodes.summary: TUMBLEWEED ROUNDUP - (SCI-FI / COMEDY) In his search for his childhood memories of Cowboy heroes and movie Westerns Mack Brown takes an unexpected turn into the world of an X-File type conspiracy. Great Northern Audio Theatre

episodes.title: CAN YOU HEAR ME?
episodes.summary: CAN YOU HEAR ME? - (SUSPENSE) MATURE THEMES! This erotic thriller was written by Thomas E. Fuller. Recorded before a live audience. Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: BRIDES OF DRACULA
episodes.summary: BRIDES OF DRACULA (HORROR) Brides of Dracula, written by Thomas E. Fuller. A Masterpiece of Horror and Suspense. Quite possibly one of the most ambitious ARTC projects.  Don’t miss it! Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: THREE WIZARD TALES
episodes.summary: THREE WIZARD TALES (COMEDY) Three tales of wizards, magic and silliness recorded before a live audience. “High Moon”, “Tell Them NAPA Sent You” and “Wizard Jack”. Great Northern Audio Theatre

episodes.title: MARINETTE 1.1
episodes.summary: MARINETTE 1.1 (SCI-FI / HORROR) A tale of voodoo and vengeance. Starring legendary US voice actor Phil Proctor. From the Audio Gothic series produced by Crazy Dog Audio Theatre

episodes.title: GUARDS! GUARDS!
episodes.summary: GUARDS! GUARDS! (MYSTERY / SORCERY) A tale of dragons, dwarves, sorcerers, and the guards, by Terry Pratchett. Adapted for audio by David Benedict, featuring John Rhys-Davies. Recorded before a live audience.  Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: BRAD’S BOOK OF LIES
episodes.summary: BRAD’S BOOK OF LIES - (DARK COMEDY) Following a nervous breakdown, the world’s greatest marketing guru realizes the only truth he has ever known is how best to tell lies. From the Audio Gothic series produced by Crazy Dog Audio Theatre

episodes.title: MARY MAGUIRE SURROUNDED BY LOVED ONES
episodes.summary: MARY MAGUIRE SURROUNDED BY LOVED ONES - (DRAMA) All is not what it seems when an old lady spends the day with her memories and surrounded by her loved ones.  Starring Karen Ardiff. From the Audio Gothic series produced by Crazy Dog Audio Theatre.

episodes.title: MARSYAS: THE HIPPEST SATYR
episodes.summary: MARSYAS: THE HIPPEST SATYR - (COMEDY / DRAMA) A jazzed up modern version of the Greek myth of Marsyas which tells the story of a cursed satyr. From the Audio Gothic series produced by Crazy Dog Audio Theatre

episodes.title: OUR FAIR CITY
episodes.summary: OUR FAIR CITY – (SCI-FI / COMEDY) A sentient whirlwind, a parking lot attendant , a newspaper reporter and camera girl join forces to clean up their corrupt city. Recorded before a live audience.  Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: THE IRISHMAN: HAVE TROLL WILL TRAVEL
episodes.summary: THE IRISHMAN: HAVE TROLL WILL TRAVEL - (COMEDY/DRAMA) A fable of magic and firearms in the wicked wild west. Crazy Dog Audio Theatre – Diabolic Playhouse

episodes.title: THE LAST DRAGON TO AVONDALE
episodes.summary: THE LAST DRAGON TO AVONDALE – (MYSTERY) A young woman on her mad rush home late one night finds herself stranded at a deserted train station where everything is not as it seems. Atlanta Radio Theatre Company

episodes.title: THE VELVETEEN SUBMISSION
episodes.summary: THE VELVETEEN SUBMISSION – (SCI-FI COMEDY) A lighthouse in space is where an eclectic group of characters are marooned. They discover that it’s about to be smacked by a space cruiser. Will they escape destruction? Great Northern Audio Theatre

episodes.title: THE SILVER TONGUED DEVIL
episodes.summary: THE SILVER TONGUED DEVIL - (DRAMA) “A documentary of poetry, pretension and possession.” Follow an investigative journalist as he seeks to unravel the mystery of a charismatic Irish poet whose voice seduced a nation. Crazy Dog Audio Theatre

episodes.title: THE DWEETS
episodes.summary: THE DWEETS (COMEDY / DRAMA) – An irrelevant look at mankind’s first contact with an alien from the planet Dweets. Precarious Audio Theater

episodes.title: DISPOSABLE LIFE
episodes.summary: DISPOSABLE LIFE – (SUSPENSE) When William's corporate job requires him to fire an employee, he realizes how troubled he is by the trappings of a middle class existence. Will a chance meeting with a stranger change his life? Midnight Radio Theatre

episodes.title: GERRY IN THE DARK PASSAGE
episodes.summary: GERRY IN THE DARK PASSAGE – (DRAMA) A dark drama in which a man experiencing a schizophrenic breakdown retreats into his graphically violent hostage-rescue computer game with tragic consequences. Crazy Dog Audio Theatre – Diabolic Playhouse

episodes.title: DEMONS OF THE DEEP
episodes.summary: DEMONS OF THE DEEP (DARK COMEDY) “A Saga of Seductive Serpents In The Salty Sea” A tempestuous dark comedy of entangled relationships set against the hunt for a mysterious sea creature. Crazy Dog Audio Theatre – Diabolic Playhouse

episodes.title: THE SUICIDE TAPES
episodes.summary: THE SUICIDE TAPES – (SUSPENSE) MATURE THEMES Following the death of Dr. Forester, the homicide investigation uncovers a series of audio tapes. In a chilling playback, the Suicide Tapes reveal the other side of madness. Midnight Radio Theatre

episodes.title: SEANCE
episodes.summary: SEANCE (MYSTERY) Jazz-era debutante Hannah believes her father was murdered, and will stop at nothing to prove her convictions and unmask the culprit! 19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: PRESS THREE
episodes.summary: PRESS THREE – (DARK COMEDY) A story of a woman who attempts to escape from a totalitarian society riddled with paranoia, colour coded alerts and constant consumerist propaganda. Crazy Dog Audio Theatre

episodes.title: HILL MANOR
episodes.summary:
HILL MANOR (COMEDY) Jonah Hill runs a Bed and Breakfast and is a most disagreeable man. The only thing worse than running a B&B is trying to make his mother, his wife and the guests from Vancouver happy!

Electric Vicuna Productions

episodes.title: BUS 13 B TO HELL
episodes.summary: BUS 13 B TO HELL (HORROR) Six unsavoury passengers and a little girl leave their broken down bus and arrive at a ghostly banquet. Will they exchange their worldly dreams for a small human fee?  Crazy Dog Audio Theatre – Diabolic Playhouse

episodes.title: A STITCH IN TIME
episodes.summary:
A STITCH IN TIME (SUSPENSE) An impoverished  taxidermist finds herself mounting the largest and most gruesome trophy of her career.

19 Nocturne Boulevard

episodes.title: GRAVES’ SHIFT OPEN FOR BUSINESS
episodes.summary: GRAVES’ SHIFT OPEN FOR BUSINESS (MYSTERY) Written and produced by Canadian Radio Dramatist Jack Ward (The Sonic Society). Follow no nonsense noir detective Phillipa Graves as she takes on her first big case. Electric Vicuna Productions

episodes.title: SOUL SURVIVOR
episodes.summary: SOUL SURVIVOR  (DRAMA) Soul Survivor is a dramatic mythic tale in which an angel and a demon vie for the soul of an innocent young girl. Electric Vicuna Productions

episodes.title: SIDES
episodes.summary: SIDES – (SUSPENSE) In the center of the room bolted to the checkerboard tile floor, is a hard, wooden chair. On that chair slumped unconscious is a man. How did he get there and why?  Brokensea Audio Productions

episodes.title: BLOOD OATH
episodes.summary: BLOOD OATH (SCI-FI / HORROR) MATURE THEMES When a Captain takes over command of a small-manned spaceship and holds the crew hostage, they must find out what unknown destination they are headed for. Will the crew succeed? Midnight Radio Theatre.

episodes.title: THE WOMAN IN THE BASEMENT
episodes.summary: THE WOMAN IN THE BASEMENT - (SUSPENSE) ) MATURE THEMES The old house charmed Courtney and Landon from the start. A perfect place to begin their new life and forget the past. However, the house has a secret of its own!  Midnight Radio Theatre.

episodes.title: DARK ROAD TO NOWHERE
episodes.summary: DARK ROAD TO NOWHERE  (HALLOWEEN/ HORROR) A young couple were driving along a lonely country road one dark and stormy night when something jumped out in front of their car. Was it a Halloween trick, an illusion or a nightmare? Voices In The Wind Audio Theatre

episodes.title: THE OUTPOST
episodes.summary:
THE OUTPOST (SCI-FI / MYSTERY) You wake up millions of light years away, in a place nothing like home. What do you do? 19 Nocturne Boulevard

 

2008 MARK TIME AWARD FOR BEST SCIENCE FICTION AUDIO DRAMA PRODUCTION!

episodes.title: BULL STUD, HE-MAN MYSTERY WRITER
episodes.summary: BULL STUD, HE-MAN MYSTERY WRITER - (COMEDY) A hard-boiled thriller writer with a soft-boiled character solves a case of international espionage with the aid of his domineering mother, his psychoanalyst and a dancing horse. ZPPR Productions
